org.qi4j.envisage.tree
Class TreeModelPane

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              javax.swing.JPanel
                  org.qi4j.envisage.tree.TreeModelPane
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
public class TreeModelPane
extends javax.swing.JPanel

Application Model View as Swing Component. It support 2 view:
- by Structure
- by Type

See Also:
Serialized Form
